text:
Animations in the slideshow utility don't work.

For example ...
java -jar batik-slideshow.jar [batik-home-dir]\batik-1.5\samples\3D.svg
creator: paul@roubekas.org
deweese@apache.org
text:
The slideshow tool is/was designed to only render static content.
So technically this is not a bug.  I have changed it to be
an RFE as it would be an interesting extension.
